name: The Triar Incident
description:
The halls of Alteria Academy lie ahead of you. 📚💎

Join the mysterious Detective Korvus to solve the mystery of the Triar Incident. Search for clues about the Grand Scholar, Kellum, interview students transformed by the explosion, and recover your memories as their professor.

Credits

Angela Do - Character Art
Annie Zhang - Art Direction, Concept, & Background Art, Composer
Eli Miller - Narrative & Sound Design
Joseph Wang - Narrative Design
Kat Gee - Concept, Character, & Prop Art
Michael Sim - Producer, Programming
Patrick Villegas - Narrative Director
Victor Dong - UI Art

FOLLOW US: Twitter | Linktree | The Triar Incident OST available on Bandcamp soon
Let us know what you think with a Rating or Comment below :D

Game developed as part of the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam
Originally published on September 30, 2022
